entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 2 to 4 cm except locally 10 cm over higher terrain. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 early this evening then becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning. Local amount 2 cm except 5 cm over higher terrain. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 7 April 2023
